section.title: D:/gitworkspace/lua/lua.h
section.programlisting: 00001 /* 00002 ** $Id: lua.h $ 00003 ** Lua - A Scripting Language 00004 ** Lua.org, PUC-Rio, Brazil (http://www.lua.org) 00005 ** See Copyright Notice at the end of this file 00006 */ 00007 00008 00009 #ifndef lua_h 00010 #define lua_h 00011 00012 #include <stdarg.h> 00013 #include <stddef.h> 00014 00015 00016 #include "luaconf.h" 00017 00018 00019 #define LUA_VERSION_MAJOR "5" 00020 #define LUA_VERSION_MINOR "4" 00021 #define LUA_VERSION_RELEASE "0" 00022 00023 #define LUA_VERSION_NUM 504 00024 #define LUA_VERSION_RELEASE_NUM (LUA_VERSION_NUM * 100 + 0) 00025 00026 #define LUA_VERSION "Lua " LUA_VERSION_MAJOR "." LUA_VERSION_MINOR 00027 #define LUA_RELEASE LUA_VERSION "." LUA_VERSION_RELEASE 00028 #define LUA_COPYRIGHT LUA_RELEASE " Copyright (C) 1994-2020 Lua.org, PUC-Rio" 00029 #define LUA_AUTHORS "R. Ierusalimschy, L. H. de Figueiredo, W. Celes" 00030 00031 00032 /* mark for precompiled code ('<esc>Lua') */ 00033 #define LUA_SIGNATURE "\x1bLua" 00034 00035 /* option for multiple returns in 'lua_pcall' and 'lua_call' */ 00036 #define LUA_MULTRET (-1) 00037 00038 00039 /* 00040 ** Pseudo-indices 00041 ** (-LUAI_MAXSTACK is the minimum valid index; we keep some free empty 00042 ** space after that to help overflow detection) 00043 */ 00044 #define LUA_REGISTRYINDEX (-LUAI_MAXSTACK - 1000) 00045 #define lua_upvalueindex(i) (LUA_REGISTRYINDEX - (i)) 00046 00047 00048 /* thread status */ 00049 #define LUA_OK 0 00050 #define LUA_YIELD 1 00051 #define LUA_ERRRUN 2 00052 #define LUA_ERRSYNTAX 3 00053 #define LUA_ERRMEM 4 00054 #define LUA_ERRERR 5 00055 00056 00057 typedef struct lua_State lua_State; 00058 00059 00060 /* 00061 ** basic types 00062 */ 00063 #define LUA_TNONE (-1) 00064 00065 #define LUA_TNIL 0 00066 #define LUA_TBOOLEAN 1 00067 #define LUA_TLIGHTUSERDATA 2 00068 #define LUA_TNUMBER 3 00069 #define LUA_TSTRING 4 00070 #define LUA_TTABLE 5 00071 #define LUA_TFUNCTION 6 00072 #define LUA_TUSERDATA 7 00073 #define LUA_TTHREAD 8 00074 00075 #define LUA_NUMTYPES 9 00076 00077 00078 00079 /* minimum Lua stack available to a C function */ 00080 #define LUA_MINSTACK 20 00081 00082 00083 /* predefined values in the registry */ 00084 #define LUA_RIDX_MAINTHREAD 1 00085 #define LUA_RIDX_GLOBALS 2 00086 #define LUA_RIDX_LAST LUA_RIDX_GLOBALS 00087 00088 00089 /* type of numbers in Lua */ 00090 typedef LUA_NUMBER lua_Number; 00091 00092 00093 /* type for integer functions */ 00094 typedef LUA_INTEGER lua_Integer; 00095 00096 /* unsigned integer type */ 00097 typedef LUA_UNSIGNED lua_Unsigned; 00098 00099 /* type for continuation-function contexts */ 00100 typedef LUA_KCONTEXT lua_KContext; 00101 00102 00103 /* 00104 ** Type for C functions registered with Lua 00105 */ 00106 typedef int (*lua_CFunction) (lua_State *L); 00107 00108 /* 00109 ** Type for continuation functions 00110 */ 00111 typedef int (*lua_KFunction) (lua_State *L, int status, lua_KContext ctx); 00112 00113 00114 /* 00115 ** Type for functions that read/write blocks when loading/dumping Lua chunks 00116 */ 00117 typedef const char * (*lua_Reader) (lua_State *L, void *ud, size_t *sz); 00118 00119 typedef int (*lua_Writer) (lua_State *L, const void *p, size_t sz, void *ud); 00120 00121 00122 /* 00123 ** Type for memory-allocation functions 00124 */ 00125 typedef void * (*lua_Alloc) (void *ud, void *ptr, size_t osize, size_t nsize); 00126 00127 00128 /* 00129 ** Type for warning functions 00130 */ 00131 typedef void (*lua_WarnFunction) (void *ud, const char *msg, int tocont); 00132 00133 00134 00135 00136 /* 00137 ** generic extra include file 00138 */ 00139 #if defined(LUA_USER_H) 00140 #include LUA_USER_H 00141 #endif 00142 00143 00144 /* 00145 ** RCS ident string 00146 */ 00147 extern const char lua_ident[]; 00148 00149 00150 /* 00151 ** state manipulation 00152 */ 00153 LUA_API lua_State *(lua_newstate) (lua_Alloc f, void *ud); 00154 LUA_API void (lua_close) (lua_State *L); 00155 LUA_API lua_State *(lua_newthread) (lua_State *L); 00156 LUA_API int (lua_resetthread) (lua_State *L); 00157 00158 LUA_API lua_CFunction (lua_atpanic) (lua_State *L, lua_CFunction panicf); 00159 00160 00161 LUA_API lua_Number (lua_version) (lua_State *L); 00162 00163 00164 /* 00165 ** basic stack manipulation 00166 */ 00167 LUA_API int (lua_absindex) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00168 LUA_API int (lua_gettop) (lua_State *L); 00169 LUA_API void (lua_settop) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00170 LUA_API void (lua_pushvalue) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00171 LUA_API void (lua_rotate) (lua_State *L, int idx, int n); 00172 LUA_API void (lua_copy) (lua_State *L, int fromidx, int toidx); 00173 LUA_API int (lua_checkstack) (lua_State *L, int n); 00174 00175 LUA_API void (lua_xmove) (lua_State *from, lua_State *to, int n); 00176 00177 00178 /* 00179 ** access functions (stack -> C) 00180 */ 00181 00182 LUA_API int (lua_isnumber) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00183 LUA_API int (lua_isstring) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00184 LUA_API int (lua_iscfunction) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00185 LUA_API int (lua_isinteger) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00186 LUA_API int (lua_isuserdata) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00187 LUA_API int (lua_type) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00188 LUA_API const char *(lua_typename) (lua_State *L, int tp); 00189 00190 LUA_API lua_Number (lua_tonumberx) (lua_State *L, int idx, int *isnum); 00191 LUA_API lua_Integer (lua_tointegerx) (lua_State *L, int idx, int *isnum); 00192 LUA_API int (lua_toboolean) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00193 LUA_API const char *(lua_tolstring) (lua_State *L, int idx, size_t *len); 00194 LUA_API lua_Unsigned (lua_rawlen) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00195 LUA_API lua_CFunction (lua_tocfunction) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00196 LUA_API void *(lua_touserdata) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00197 LUA_API lua_State *(lua_tothread) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00198 LUA_API const void *(lua_topointer) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00199 00200 00201 /* 00202 ** Comparison and arithmetic functions 00203 */ 00204 00205 #define LUA_OPADD 0 /* ORDER TM, ORDER OP */ 00206 #define LUA_OPSUB 1 00207 #define LUA_OPMUL 2 00208 #define LUA_OPMOD 3 00209 #define LUA_OPPOW 4 00210 #define LUA_OPDIV 5 00211 #define LUA_OPIDIV 6 00212 #define LUA_OPBAND 7 00213 #define LUA_OPBOR 8 00214 #define LUA_OPBXOR 9 00215 #define LUA_OPSHL 10 00216 #define LUA_OPSHR 11 00217 #define LUA_OPUNM 12 00218 #define LUA_OPBNOT 13 00219 00220 LUA_API void (lua_arith) (lua_State *L, int op); 00221 00222 #define LUA_OPEQ 0 00223 #define LUA_OPLT 1 00224 #define LUA_OPLE 2 00225 00226 LUA_API int (lua_rawequal) (lua_State *L, int idx1, int idx2); 00227 LUA_API int (lua_compare) (lua_State *L, int idx1, int idx2, int op); 00228 00229 00230 /* 00231 ** push functions (C -> stack) 00232 */ 00233 LUA_API void (lua_pushnil) (lua_State *L); 00234 LUA_API void (lua_pushnumber) (lua_State *L, lua_Number n); 00235 LUA_API void (lua_pushinteger) (lua_State *L, lua_Integer n); 00236 LUA_API const char *(lua_pushlstring) (lua_State *L, const char *s, size_t len); 00237 LUA_API const char *(lua_pushstring) (lua_State *L, const char *s); 00238 LUA_API const char *(lua_pushvfstring) (lua_State *L, const char *fmt, 00239 va_list argp); 00240 LUA_API const char *(lua_pushfstring) (lua_State *L, const char *fmt, ...); 00241 LUA_API void (lua_pushcclosure) (lua_State *L, lua_CFunction fn, int n); 00242 LUA_API void (lua_pushboolean) (lua_State *L, int b); 00243 LUA_API void (lua_pushlightuserdata) (lua_State *L, void *p); 00244 LUA_API int (lua_pushthread) (lua_State *L); 00245 00246 00247 /* 00248 ** get functions (Lua -> stack) 00249 */ 00250 LUA_API int (lua_getglobal) (lua_State *L, const char *name); 00251 LUA_API int (lua_gettable) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00252 LUA_API int (lua_getfield) (lua_State *L, int idx, const char *k); 00253 LUA_API int (lua_geti) (lua_State *L, int idx, lua_Integer n); 00254 LUA_API int (lua_rawget) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00255 LUA_API int (lua_rawgeti) (lua_State *L, int idx, lua_Integer n); 00256 LUA_API int (lua_rawgetp) (lua_State *L, int idx, const void *p); 00257 00258 LUA_API void (lua_createtable) (lua_State *L, int narr, int nrec); 00259 LUA_API void *(lua_newuserdatauv) (lua_State *L, size_t sz, int nuvalue); 00260 LUA_API int (lua_getmetatable) (lua_State *L, int objindex); 00261 LUA_API int (lua_getiuservalue) (lua_State *L, int idx, int n); 00262 00263 00264 /* 00265 ** set functions (stack -> Lua) 00266 */ 00267 LUA_API void (lua_setglobal) (lua_State *L, const char *name); 00268 LUA_API void (lua_settable) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00269 LUA_API void (lua_setfield) (lua_State *L, int idx, const char *k); 00270 LUA_API void (lua_seti) (lua_State *L, int idx, lua_Integer n); 00271 LUA_API void (lua_rawset) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00272 LUA_API void (lua_rawseti) (lua_State *L, int idx, lua_Integer n); 00273 LUA_API void (lua_rawsetp) (lua_State *L, int idx, const void *p); 00274 LUA_API int (lua_setmetatable) (lua_State *L, int objindex); 00275 LUA_API int (lua_setiuservalue) (lua_State *L, int idx, int n); 00276 00277 00278 /* 00279 ** 'load' and 'call' functions (load and run Lua code) 00280 */ 00281 LUA_API void (lua_callk) (lua_State *L, int nargs, int nresults, 00282 lua_KContext ctx, lua_KFunction k); 00283 #define lua_call(L,n,r) lua_callk(L, (n), (r), 0, NULL) 00284 00285 LUA_API int (lua_pcallk) (lua_State *L, int nargs, int nresults, int errfunc, 00286 lua_KContext ctx, lua_KFunction k); 00287 #define lua_pcall(L,n,r,f) lua_pcallk(L, (n), (r), (f), 0, NULL) 00288 00289 LUA_API int (lua_load) (lua_State *L, lua_Reader reader, void *dt, 00290 const char *chunkname, const char *mode); 00291 00292 LUA_API int (lua_dump) (lua_State *L, lua_Writer writer, void *data, int strip); 00293 00294 00295 /* 00296 ** coroutine functions 00297 */ 00298 LUA_API int (lua_yieldk) (lua_State *L, int nresults, lua_KContext ctx, 00299 lua_KFunction k); 00300 LUA_API int (lua_resume) (lua_State *L, lua_State *from, int narg, 00301 int *nres); 00302 LUA_API int (lua_status) (lua_State *L); 00303 LUA_API int (lua_isyieldable) (lua_State *L); 00304 00305 #define lua_yield(L,n) lua_yieldk(L, (n), 0, NULL) 00306 00307 00308 /* 00309 ** Warning-related functions 00310 */ 00311 LUA_API void (lua_setwarnf) (lua_State *L, lua_WarnFunction f, void *ud); 00312 LUA_API void (lua_warning) (lua_State *L, const char *msg, int tocont); 00313 00314 00315 /* 00316 ** garbage-collection function and options 00317 */ 00318 00319 #define LUA_GCSTOP 0 00320 #define LUA_GCRESTART 1 00321 #define LUA_GCCOLLECT 2 00322 #define LUA_GCCOUNT 3 00323 #define LUA_GCCOUNTB 4 00324 #define LUA_GCSTEP 5 00325 #define LUA_GCSETPAUSE 6 00326 #define LUA_GCSETSTEPMUL 7 00327 #define LUA_GCISRUNNING 9 00328 #define LUA_GCGEN 10 00329 #define LUA_GCINC 11 00330 00331 LUA_API int (lua_gc) (lua_State *L, int what, ...); 00332 00333 00334 /* 00335 ** miscellaneous functions 00336 */ 00337 00338 LUA_API int (lua_error) (lua_State *L); 00339 00340 LUA_API int (lua_next) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00341 00342 LUA_API void (lua_concat) (lua_State *L, int n); 00343 LUA_API void (lua_len) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00344 00345 LUA_API size_t (lua_stringtonumber) (lua_State *L, const char *s); 00346 00347 LUA_API lua_Alloc (lua_getallocf) (lua_State *L, void **ud); 00348 LUA_API void (lua_setallocf) (lua_State *L, lua_Alloc f, void *ud); 00349 00350 LUA_API void (lua_toclose) (lua_State *L, int idx); 00351 00352 00353 /* 00354 ** {============================================================== 00355 ** some useful macros 00356 ** =============================================================== 00357 */ 00358 00359 #define lua_getextraspace(L) ((void *)((char *)(L) - LUA_EXTRASPACE)) 00360 00361 #define lua_tonumber(L,i) lua_tonumberx(L,(i),NULL) 00362 #define lua_tointeger(L,i) lua_tointegerx(L,(i),NULL) 00363 00364 #define lua_pop(L,n) lua_settop(L, -(n)-1) 00365 00366 #define lua_newtable(L) lua_createtable(L, 0, 0) 00367 00368 #define lua_register(L,n,f) (lua_pushcfunction(L, (f)), lua_setglobal(L, (n))) 00369 00370 #define lua_pushcfunction(L,f) lua_pushcclosure(L, (f), 0) 00371 00372 #define lua_isfunction(L,n) (lua_type(L, (n)) == LUA_TFUNCTION) 00373 #define lua_istable(L,n) (lua_type(L, (n)) == LUA_TTABLE) 00374 #define lua_islightuserdata(L,n) (lua_type(L, (n)) == LUA_TLIGHTUSERDATA) 00375 #define lua_isnil(L,n) (lua_type(L, (n)) == LUA_TNIL) 00376 #define lua_isboolean(L,n) (lua_type(L, (n)) == LUA_TBOOLEAN) 00377 #define lua_isthread(L,n) (lua_type(L, (n)) == LUA_TTHREAD) 00378 #define lua_isnone(L,n) (lua_type(L, (n)) == LUA_TNONE) 00379 #define lua_isnoneornil(L, n) (lua_type(L, (n)) <= 0) 00380 00381 #define lua_pushliteral(L, s) lua_pushstring(L, "" s) 00382 00383 #define lua_pushglobaltable(L) \ 00384 ((void)lua_rawgeti(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, LUA_RIDX_GLOBALS)) 00385 00386 #define lua_tostring(L,i) lua_tolstring(L, (i), NULL) 00387 00388 00389 #define lua_insert(L,idx) lua_rotate(L, (idx), 1) 00390 00391 #define lua_remove(L,idx) (lua_rotate(L, (idx), -1), lua_pop(L, 1)) 00392 00393 #define lua_replace(L,idx) (lua_copy(L, -1, (idx)), lua_pop(L, 1)) 00394 00395 /* }============================================================== */ 00396 00397 00398 /* 00399 ** {============================================================== 00400 ** compatibility macros 00401 ** =============================================================== 00402 */ 00403 #if defined(LUA_COMPAT_APIINTCASTS) 00404 00405 #define lua_pushunsigned(L,n) lua_pushinteger(L, (lua_Integer)(n)) 00406 #define lua_tounsignedx(L,i,is) ((lua_Unsigned)lua_tointegerx(L,i,is)) 00407 #define lua_tounsigned(L,i) lua_tounsignedx(L,(i),NULL) 00408 00409 #endif 00410 00411 #define lua_newuserdata(L,s) lua_newuserdatauv(L,s,1) 00412 #define lua_getuservalue(L,idx) lua_getiuservalue(L,idx,1) 00413 #define lua_setuservalue(L,idx) lua_setiuservalue(L,idx,1) 00414 00415 #define LUA_NUMTAGS LUA_NUMTYPES 00416 00417 /* }============================================================== */ 00418 00419 /* 00420 ** {====================================================================== 00421 ** Debug API 00422 ** ======================================================================= 00423 */ 00424 00425 00426 /* 00427 ** Event codes 00428 */ 00429 #define LUA_HOOKCALL 0 00430 #define LUA_HOOKRET 1 00431 #define LUA_HOOKLINE 2 00432 #define LUA_HOOKCOUNT 3 00433 #define LUA_HOOKTAILCALL 4 00434 00435 00436 /* 00437 ** Event masks 00438 */ 00439 #define LUA_MASKCALL (1 << LUA_HOOKCALL) 00440 #define LUA_MASKRET (1 << LUA_HOOKRET) 00441 #define LUA_MASKLINE (1 << LUA_HOOKLINE) 00442 #define LUA_MASKCOUNT (1 << LUA_HOOKCOUNT) 00443 00444 typedef struct lua_Debug lua_Debug; /* activation record */ 00445 00446 00447 /* Functions to be called by the debugger in specific events */ 00448 typedef void (*lua_Hook) (lua_State *L, lua_Debug *ar); 00449 00450 00451 LUA_API int (lua_getstack) (lua_State *L, int level, lua_Debug *ar); 00452 LUA_API int (lua_getinfo) (lua_State *L, const char *what, lua_Debug *ar); 00453 LUA_API const char *(lua_getlocal) (lua_State *L, const lua_Debug *ar, int n); 00454 LUA_API const char *(lua_setlocal) (lua_State *L, const lua_Debug *ar, int n); 00455 LUA_API const char *(lua_getupvalue) (lua_State *L, int funcindex, int n); 00456 LUA_API const char *(lua_setupvalue) (lua_State *L, int funcindex, int n); 00457 00458 LUA_API void *(lua_upvalueid) (lua_State *L, int fidx, int n); 00459 LUA_API void (lua_upvaluejoin) (lua_State *L, int fidx1, int n1, 00460 int fidx2, int n2); 00461 00462 LUA_API void (lua_sethook) (lua_State *L, lua_Hook func, int mask, int count); 00463 LUA_API lua_Hook (lua_gethook) (lua_State *L); 00464 LUA_API int (lua_gethookmask) (lua_State *L); 00465 LUA_API int (lua_gethookcount) (lua_State *L); 00466 00467 LUA_API int (lua_setcstacklimit) (lua_State *L, unsigned int limit); 00468 00469 struct lua_Debug { 00470 int event; 00471 const char *name; /* (n) */ 00472 const char *namewhat; /* (n) 'global', 'local', 'field', 'method' */ 00473 const char *what; /* (S) 'Lua', 'C', 'main', 'tail' */ 00474 const char *source; /* (S) */ 00475 size_t srclen; /* (S) */ 00476 int currentline; /* (l) */ 00477 int linedefined; /* (S) */ 00478 int lastlinedefined; /* (S) */ 00479 unsigned char nups; /* (u) number of upvalues */ 00480 unsigned char nparams;/* (u) number of parameters */ 00481 char isvararg; /* (u) */ 00482 char istailcall; /* (t) */ 00483 unsigned short ftransfer; /* (r) index of first value transferred */ 00484 unsigned short ntransfer; /* (r) number of transferred values */ 00485 char short_src[LUA_IDSIZE]; /* (S) */ 00486 /* private part */ 00487 struct CallInfo *i_ci; /* active function */ 00488 }; 00489 00490 /*
